content.overview: It allows to model an object that specifies the measurements for widgets whose parents are ZStack Widgets.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

properties.name: AlignParentTop
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget will be positioned relative to the top area of ​​its parent widget.

properties.name: AlignParentBottom
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget will be positioned relative to the bottom area of its parent widget.

properties.name: AlignParentLeft
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget will be positioned relative to the left area of its parent widget.

properties.name: AlignParentRight
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget will be positioned relative to the right area of its parent widget.

properties.name: AlignParentStart
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget will be positioned relative to the start(left top) of its parent widget.

properties.name: AlignParentEnd
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget will be positioned relative to the end(right bottom) of its parent widget.

properties.name: CenterInParent
properties.description: Specifies whether the widget should be centered on its parent widget.

properties.name: ToLeftOf
properties.description: The widget will be positioned relatively to the left side of the indicated widget.

properties.name: ToRightOf
properties.description: The widget will be positioned relatively to the right side of the indicated widget.

properties.name: Above
properties.description: The widget will be positioned relatively to the top side of the indicated widget.

properties.name: Below
properties.description: The widget will be positioned relatively to the bottom side of the indicated widget.

properties.name: CenterHorizontal
properties.description: The widget will be centered horizontally on its parent widget.

properties.name: CenterVertical
properties.description: The widget will be centered vertically on its parent widget.

properties.name: ToStartOf
properties.description: The widget will be positioned relatively to the start(top left) of the indicated widget.

properties.name: ToEndOf
properties.description: The widget will be positioned relatively to the end of the indicated widget.

properties.name: MarginLeft
properties.description: Specifies the extra space on the left side of the widget.

properties.name: MarginRight
properties.description: Specifies the extra space on the right side of the widget.

properties.name: MarginTop
properties.description: Specifies the extra space on the top side of the widget.

properties.name: MarginBottom
properties.description: Specifies the extra space on the bottom side of the widget.

properties.name: Margin
properties.description: Specifies the extra space for all sides of the widget.
info: It should be used when all the extra spaces should be the same.

properties.name: Width
properties.description: Specifies the width of the widget.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: Specifies the height of the widget.

properties.name: FillParent
properties.description: A value that specifies that the widget will occupy all the space in its parent widget.

properties.name: FillAutomatic
properties.description: A value that specifies that the widget will occupy only the space that it needs.
